message.content: I need to add an error element for the add feed form as well. Let me update the HTML:

function.arguments:
{"command": "str_replace", "path": "/workspace/SheepVibes/frontend/index.html", "old_str": "

        <div id="add-feed-section">
            <input type="text" id="feed-url-input" placeholder="Enter feed URL">
            <button id="add-feed-button">Add Feed</button>
", "new_str": "

        <div id="add-feed-section">
            <input type="text" id="feed-url-input" placeholder="Enter feed URL">
            <small id="add-feed-error" style="color: red; display: none;"></small>
            <button id="add-feed-button">Add Feed</button>
", "security_risk": "LOW"}
